item.title: How network interfaces work
item.author: sanyia.saidova@gmail.com (Sanyia Saidova)
item.description: Questions What exactly are they? Are they a hardware device or can it be virtualised? If it’s virtualised, how can I create my own? How do network sockets relate to a network interface? Is the stuff that I wrote in the 20211228 time note correct? Notes On the 20211228 time note, I wrote some initial notes about them References Really good ELI5 explanation of a network socket Quora explanation
